topics.title: Agriculture, energy and environment
topics.description: Food and farming, natural environment, flooding and water, and environmental quality.

topics.title: Climate Change
topics.description: Long term shifts in temperature and weather patterns of the environment.

topics.title: Carbon Emissions
topics.description: Carbon dioxide emissions or CO2 emissions are emissions stemming from the burning of fossil fuels and the manufacture of cement; they include carbon dioxide produced during consumption of solid, liquid, and gas fuels as well as gas flaring.

topics.title: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
topics.description: Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from human and industrial activities.

topics.title: Business, trade and international development
topics.description: Company structure, closures or mergers; and turnover, international and UK trade, and research and development.

topics.title: IT and Internet Industry
topics.description: Internet sales by businesses in the UK (total value and as a percentage of all retail sales) and the percentage of businesses that have a website and broadband connection. These figures indicate the importance of the internet to UK businesses.

topics.title: Communication
topics.description: The imparting or exchanging of information by speaking, writing, or using some other medium.

topics.title: Children, education and skills
topics.description: Teachers and lecturers, learners, and those not in education, employment or training.

topics.title: Crime and security
topics.description: Crime; justice systems (family, civil and criminal); and policing, people, organisations and money.

topics.title: Economy
topics.description: The UK economy and the economies of Devolved Administrations and UK regions.

topics.title: Prices
topics.description: Changes in the prices of goods bought and sold by UK manufacturers.

topics.title: Health and social care
topics.description: Health care provision, social care provision, health status and disease, disability, cause of death, and health and safety at work.

topics.title: Housing, planning and local services
topics.description: Current housing, housing estimates and projections, homelessness, housing requirements and industrial and residential planning .

topics.title: Labour Market and Welfare
topics.description: Includes statistics measuring different aspects of work and jobs and covers people's employment, working patterns, and the types of work they do.

topics.title: Travel, transport and tourism
topics.description: Includes all modes of travel and transport, transport infrastructure and tourism. Also includes travel patterns and distances travelled, and international visits to the UK.
